message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm valuing the product at a slightly higher price point. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $125?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you at $122.50. Can you consider that?
